name: 1956 Budapest
description:
1956 Budapest is a historical first person shooter, which tries to remake the famous Hungarian revolution of 1956, against the soviet superpower. 

This game is still in the very early part of developement, a lots of things are missing, which I would want to add later, stay tuned for the updates! You can try these early versions for free, however, the full release of the game will cost money.

In this game you can shoot soviet soldiers, but please, don't hate Russians and Russians, don't hate me for that. I will try to add a Russian mode later as well, where you can shoot Hungarians, just to be fair.
